titleStmt.title: Bethel and Smith, or, A sober answer to a tantivy pamphlet entitled How and Rich, &c. by one of the inhabitants of the burrough of Southwark, who is no Bromidgham Protestant.
titleStmt.author: One of the inhabitants of the burrough of Southwark.

notesStmt.note: A reply to How and Rich by One of the loyal inhabitants of that antient burrough. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
